content.detailedDescription: I stepped out of the european street cafe on san marco st. in jacksonville, fl and tuened left to walk to my car. i believe i was facing north. i looked up into the dark sky. i saw a white streak travelling at veryhig speed from lef to right, possibly west to east. my first thoughtwas "if thats a jet, it's moving through the cloud cover (est. 5-10k feet) at an amazin speed". my next thouht was " a jet can't move that fast across the sky, regardless of the relatively low altitude". when the light winked out completely after 2 to three observed seconds, i felt strongly it was no jet- besides, i relized there was no jet noise. ifit were at a higher than my perceived altitude, i may not have been able to hear it over the ambient city noise, but that would have raised its relative speed to an even higher level, convincing me more that it wasn't a jet. my next thought was "that may have been the  end of life of a meteoror boloid (is that what a glowing burning rock is called?). the color of the speeding licht was white and bluish, possibly accounted for if it was penetrating the cloud cover. there was no yellow flame appearance, or explosion at the end- it just winked out.
content.summary: White streak across sky for 3 seconds at tremendous speed then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving west on fruitridge rd and turning left onto freeport blvd going south.  i noticed a bright white round object right at about eye level 3- o clock.  way in the distance thinking is that the moon? or venus? 1/4 mile or less down freeport blvd is the slightest rise at 35th ave is a 3 way stop light. waiting on red light no cars in front of me. object now at 2- o clock dime size with a round pencil size eraser bright white light with in the round circle.  heat waves all around the eraser size circle.  but not outside the dime or covering the circle.  like everything was in a bubble. driving 1/4 mile to next 3 way stop light at 43rd ave.  stopped at light now looking up at 12 o clock.  bending way near the steering wheel to look up at the object.  object was blurry changing from bright white to orange.  object seemed about 40' or 50' in the air.  i looked away to see if the light changed and it was gone.

what i was thinking.  what i'm think now!

1) object didn't seem like it moved. clear day no clouds.  
2) object was a reflection. yes probably so! i have a cracked wind-
   shield right under rear view mirror running from passenger side 
   up to the mirror. sun was about 3 oclock to the west.
3) object was a plane? yes maybe.  freeport blvd runs parallel 
   executive airport right where i was driving at! should have
   called traffic controllers. they were eye level.  dummy
4) i moved my head around while looking at the object and it always
   stayed in the same spot?  never lost sight of it. nothing
   reflective on dash.  but probably reflection/plane?
content.summary: Round object size of a dime.  bright  round light in the center with what looked like heat waves inclosed with in the dime sized object.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in a field with my friend and we had been there since 9:30pm to see the orionid meteor shower that morning.  around 1 am the meteors began falling more frequently then out of no where a huge bright light just showed up behind a tree.  we clearly saw red lights and blue lights alternating with white.  it allmost was pulsating and alternating with the blue and red light.  the red was on the top right corner and the blue was on the bottom left and the white light was constant and pulsing.  it kept moving and disappearing behind the tree and i mention it to my friend "what is that" and from that point we stared at it constantly.  he joked around and said oooo its a ufo and i said i wont get freaked out until it gets above the tree line.  i went through every possible scenerio to figured out what this thing was.  5 min approx. after he joked around and i said something about the tree line it did a direct vertical jump and went straight up in to the middle of the sky and began to hover and it was clearly dancing around and going up and down then left then right then down again and it kept getting dimmer and dimmer and over the course of 4 hours it moved from the tree light up in between 2 stars and stayed there even when the stars moved in the turning of the night going into morning the object clearly made it a point to stay within these two stars. then around 4 30 am i went to check on it again and i stayed out there prob 15 minutes and the object began to get very bright and then just disappeared within seconds. i am going to sit outside again tonight to see if i can shed some more light on this but i went through every possible explanation and none of them make sense. i called my mother at 3 in the morning asking her what she thought it could be because she used to be in the air force and i didnt know if it was a type of plane, weather balloon, satelite, helicopter, tower, but nothing could explain it i hope someone can help. please help me shed some light on this i am truely in shock right now. there are no photos of the object because it was to dark to take a good picture but i tried and they all came out black.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: During the orionid meteor shower

content.detailedDescription:
I was painting the eave in front of the house prior to buying it through the va. my wife andthe owners son were standing on the walk leading to the front door. it was a quite day,the first nice day of that month. icould hear the traffic from the park way 3/4s of a mile away, suddenly it became very quiteand i felt the sensation of needles running across my back, i turned tosee the disc over the house across the street hovering at a 60degree angle. i called to my wife and frank, they were looking at not moving i yelled at them to turn and look. they didn't acknowlege me. i felt like i hada muffler over my head as i could hear my self talking,but nothing was coming outi  got off the ladder came off the roof my wife and frank did't look at me,they were looking at where i had been.
i ran to the side walk wheni got there it started to move very slowly going to the verticle and made 90 degree to west[it was just above the telephone poles it proceded west and rose slightly appox.200ft angled slightly and accelerated at extremely fast rate of speed, i could see aring of light on the leading edge of the disc. i went back to my wife and they asked me where i went. 
to this day my wife says that she didn't see or hear anything
content.summary: 40ft across ,over the house across the street  on a60 degree angle tome

content.detailedDescription: On oct.8,2009 at approx. 10:00am my wife saw a very large ufo over our house in jonesborough,tn. she described it as being very large(bigger than our house),white and shaped like a disk with dome shaped top. it was not very high by her estimate (probable less than 1000ft.), it was almost motionless and it was silent. it's edges were rounded instead of being sharp and there appeared to be something like windows around the bottom part. we left the house and about one-half mile away she saw it again. she became excited and told me it was aliens. i saw the object which i first took to be an airplane seen from the side, but it was motionless and silent. i could not stop because another vehicle was behind me but i did see it as i drove to a place to stop. we turned around and drove back to get a look. we saw the object which was probable less than one-half mile away. it went from being motionless to assuming a constant speed. it did not slowly accelerate, it just assumed a speed or velocity. it changed course, moved away from us quickly went to a distant point of light.
content.summary: Saw a very large ufo over our house

content.detailedDescription: I went for a walk at around 10pm, as i got closer to home, i was walking past a residential river type drain that runs down next to a touch field which is apart of a large showground area. as i was about 5mins from home i looked at my cell phone to check the time. as i looked up in the sky twice the height above the large touch field lights which were off, a small red dot which was about the size of a star seemed to catch my attention. as i stared at it the dot seemed to get bigger a brighter it got several times  the size, but stayed in the same spot. as i realized what i was seeing i began to run towards the well lit street which intersected with the part i was walking on, as i was doing this i tryed to take a photo on my phone but nothing was captured. as i was running the light had dissappered when i go to the road there was nothing left in the amidieate area.
content.summary: A red circular beam of light which grow from a small size to a much larger size in the air, then quickly shrunk down in size and dissapered.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were returning home at about 10 pm on january 3, 2009.  when just above our horizon to our right, there appeared a large turquoise ball with an attached tail streaming behind it.  it followed our horizon which was curved as we were looking up a small incline in the road.  it continued to the left then went out of sight behind some trees.  there was no noise whatsoever while in the air nor if it crashed to earth.  it absolutely took my breath away.  i  asked greg, "did you see that"?  he said yes.  i immediately called my sister about it them proceeded to try and draw it very roughly.  i am still in awe of that night.  i cannot fathom that we were the only ones to witness it, but it was late and very cold.
content.summary: A large bright turquoise ball with a huge tail streaming behind it.  it went from left to right, then out of sight.  my husband was with me.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 8:45pm on october 20th, i saw a low flying jet fly above my grandmother's house as i walked to my vehicle.  as i watched where it was heading, i saw a low, hovering gathering of lights.  i decided to drive toward the object to get a better look, and i saw what appeared to be a square/multisided shape with various colored lights (red, blue and white.  the red lights slowly blinked) hovering over some houses and countryside.  several (what appeared to be) jets or airplanes were in the area, flying in the general area of the craft, and kept changing their direction, in what appeared to be pursuit or at least surveillance of the craft. as i drove nearer to the craft, i could hear a loud rumbeling sound. i drove back to my grandmother's house, and grabbed my grandmother's camera, and she and i went after the craft again.  i took some pictures, but nothing turned out.  we followed the craft down pleasant valley road towards boring, or.  we kept losing sight of the craft through the trees, but kept seeing various jets flying overhead.  eventually, we turned back toward my grandmother's house.  to the south, we saw what appeared to be the craft swiftly speed up to the sky and slowly fade away.  i am still very shaken up about this.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo over gresham outskirts being circled by fighter jets?

content.detailedDescription:
We were behind an office complex having a conversation when i looked up and saw what i thought was a shooting star and then i noticed there were three moving objects, not just one. they were dull red lights connected and the base of the object appeared to be grey or dullish grey. i grabbed my friend and pointed up and he saw it drifting north also. we watched it for under half a minute. it was traveling north and then it was obscured by the city lights of slc. it was stunning.


at first i thought it was a shooting star, as we see those a lot in utah. then, seeing that it did not fade i suspected it was an airplane as it was parallel to the slc flight path (heading north). then it had no flashing lights, only a soft reddish glow (like hot metal or burning embers?). then it was gone.

the hair stood up on the back of my neck. i was stunned and amazed at what i saw. i was frightened and amazed at the same time. i kept looking to the sky after it was gone to see if it would happen again, but i did not see it again.

i did call out to another person who was 20 feet away from us but he was too late looking up to see anything.

it drifted off into the lights of slc so i could no longer see it.

slc = salt lake city
content.summary: Triangle shaped object, dull red corners like glowing embers, grey bottom

content.detailedDescription: In the early morning hours of the 19th of october, 2009, i was returning to my home in the se part of henderson when i noticed three extremely bright lights hovering over the mountain my home resides no more than 3 miles away from me.  i was immediately curious and pulled onto a dirt road outside my neighborhood to watch the strange lights.  after staring for about 7 to 10 minutes i decided that perhaps they put lights on top of the mountain for some reason when i finally noticed the lights to be getting brighter.  i exited my vehicle to get a better look at what was now traveling towards me because i began to think it was an airliner yet it was making no noise and was flying too low over the mountain to be one.  i immediately when for my phone to try to get a picture but my phone was acting strange and i could not get to its camera.  i watched as this silent object moved towards me and eventually i noticed that on the bottom side of it were 5 large, extremely bright, rectangular-shaped lights.   due to the lights unearth it and the dark sky i was unable to determine the shape of the object but i would guess it was almost diamond shape due to the locations of other bright white lights on it.  this object had my completely transfixed,  i could not remove my gaze for it and i wantd to take a picture and call out for other people but i was frozen in shock, and curiosity.  it flew very low over me compared to all airliners in my area i would say approximately 400 feet.  after flying over me it made a hard turn towards the north and turned extremely shap for an object of its size rather effortlessly. i saw it continuing to turn and it had made a 270 degree turn quickly and disappeared behind the mountain.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I saw 3 floating lights hovering above a mountain which then came and flew over me low and turned hard and flew away all silently

content.detailedDescription: On october 18th around 1 and 2 am there was something hovering a very loud noise above my home. it was no helicopter because after the noise there were helicopter i believe looking for this object. but for 5 to 10 minutes, it hovered a high pressured-like noise. very strange. i strongly believe there has been ufo active around this area as i and my father saw couple of objects going by very high in the sky at night on thursday and on friday we saw a bright orange glow object. that could be a planet, but looks very close. i hope other have heard or seen something similar. great experience!
content.summary: Something big was above my home!

content.detailedDescription: Was driving east on route 12e from dexter ny to  watertown ny.  going to work.  saw bright light near the local (small) airport, first thought it was the beacon light, then realized it was too bright and was not moving. as i neared the airport i was able to see two sources of light, one being the airport beacon and another brighter source a bit further past the airport.  i pulled to a stop alongside the road adjacent to the light, having observed it to be eminating from a saucer shaped craft approximately 150-200 feet in diameter.  there were bright lights along its outer perimeter and on top and underneath.  the lights were different colors, greens, reds, blues.  the craft was just above the trees and was only approximately 100 yards from where i stood alongside the road.  i ovserved the craft for about a minute after getting out of my vehicle.  i heard another car approaching on the road and turned my head to see if they were going to pull over.  when i looked back the craft had disappeared.  i was not frightened, i was curious.
content.summary: Craft hovering above trees, no sound, many bright lights, then disappeard

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south on scenic hwy, towards town at about 9 pm.I saw what appeared to be a plane making an approach to the airport. i noticed that it seemed to be flying to low and too slow. i watched it until i got to hyde park drive and pulled over to the side of the road. my son and i watched as it crossed hyde park at a very slow rate of speed, about 15 or 20 mph. it made no sound whatsoever. it crossed hyde park and continued north following the path of scenic hwy. we were both astounded and he said "its going too slow and its not making any noise." he is autistic and i was surprised he mentioned it at all.
  it was triangular in shape and about 200 feet long and about 75 feet wide. it had bright white lights along its edge and a orange glow coming from the rear. i have included a sketch i made.
  it was like nothing i have ever seen before and i have seen many strange things in my life.
  it was no more than a hundred feet or so in the air and no more than a few hundred feet from me. i am a land surveyor so i have a pretty good judge of distance. 
  we watched as it continued north along scenic hwy. i don't know why i didn't turn around and try to follow it. i have included a sketch i made.
content.summary: Spotted something on scenic hwy

content.detailedDescription: Saw a triangle fly over fermilab collider facility three red lights on it no noise also i have been into ufos since elementry school have seen other sightings of what look like stars moving acros the sky and doing u turns have seen a blue light come into my bedroom that my girlfriend witnessed then i was forced to fall asleep i am positive i am an abductee and want to be hypnotized to remember more please contact me any time.
content.summary: Triangle three red lights no sound

content.detailedDescription:
On 10-19-09 at or about 2115 hours i was sitting on my patio smoking before getting ready for work. i heard the sound of two jet fighters taking off from fat, this is normal and i can always see them during the day or their lights at night because the wind blows from the west here and that's how the air traffic works out of fat, most of the time. i was looking for the air national guard fighters and didn't see them like i always do.

i looked down for a sec and something caught my eye. i looked back up and saw something huge, dark as the night sky, moving from north to the south, three red lights forming a triangle with one flashing light on the left side. it was moving slow and there was sound like a jet engine. this thing was huge. i can't say how huge or high it was because it's hard to guess. if i tried to guess, i'd say it was 200 ft and the size of a football field.

when i first saw it, i thought it was normal air traffic because everything out of fat flys over me. however, all the air traffic that does fly over me has their landing or take off, cabin lights on. this thing was blacked out except for those red lights.

i was frightened by this because i didn't know what it was. i told my wife and she said she'd saw the same thing a year ago. after i saw this i only told two people for fear of what people might think or say.

i lost sight of it as it passed over me traveling south and over my roof.

i think it was something we have because of this. aliens don't need anti-collision lights or jet engines. i would think.

so here's your report...It still freaked me out.
content.summary: Huge triangle over me, moving slow with three red lights.

content.detailedDescription: i went to retrieve the newspaper at 6:30 a.M. and the sky was quite clear; the sun had just started to lighten the sky. as i was walking back into the house, i looked north, and right near the little dipper(?) there was this bright immobile "star". as i was watching it, the "star" slowly dimmed out to nothing like it was on a dimmer switch. it hadn't moved at all before it faded out and after it went out i stood there for a few moments to see if the light may have been part of an aircraft's running lights. but the light never came back on and there was no other movement in the sky.
content.summary: It was like a bright star or bright planet

content.detailedDescription:
This was watched by 8 to 10 people for 20 minutes. the best video went untaped but it was taped near the end of the event for a good 2 minutes of strange weather or whatever this may have been. please tell me because i have never seen anything like this.

it is on youtube:

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=1iage9f0k1q
content.summary: Constant light beams eminating from the top of thunderhead changing direction every 15 to 20 seconds for many minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the h1 town bound on the freeway @ 9:30 in the morning with my family and i spotted a white object in the sky while i was passing the stadium.  the object appeared from nowhere and moved upward in a straight line until i couldn't see it anymore.  the object was a perfect elongated rectangle with no other visible markings.  it moved at a very fast pace flying higher towards the clouds then went totally out of sight.
content.summary: Rising white, elongated rectangle.

content.detailedDescription: Me and 5 of my friends were in my back yard having a bonfire. it was about 12:00 at night and we put out the fire because i have to wake up in 5 hours to go bow hunting. as we were walking up my back driveway, my friend dan looked up above the trees and saw the 5 lights. he then told my friend cal and he looked up and pretty much freaked out. this is when we all looked up and were amazed at what we were looking at. we then ran out to the front of my house and went across the street to get a better look. the first thing we did was trying to analyze what we were looking at. my first thought was that they were balloons attached to a line moving back and fourth, but this didnt seem right because the spheres stayed in a perfectly straight line. we watch if for about a half hour just moving left to right. i couldnt tell how far it was off the ground and we compared it to the surrounding stars and it was multiple times bright than any star in the sky. after a while i went inside and my friends stayed outside to watch the ufo. one of my friends brad called some of his friends to come see what we were looking at. they were about 5 minutes from my house on english and frost avenue when the object few from its position across the lake which looked from my house looked like it was above st. paul. so after being in the same area moving right to left the object few slowly towards us over the lake and over my house and as this was happening my friend who was on the phone with his friends told them to pull over and look up because they were on frost avenue. they got out and saw the 5 lights go over them stop, move really fast in one direction and take off. they were freaked out because they thought we were lieing and they were not ready to see what they saw. i have never seen anything like this in my life and i have tired to look up other sightings or pictures of what we saw and i cant find anything. we tried to take pictures with phones and cameras but nothing showed up. we really needed a video camera but we did record the audio of everyone when the object flew over. my friend cal has it recorded on his phone so i couldnt put it on here but hopefully you found this intersting and please contact me if you can help me figure out what we saw.
content.summary: 5 spheres in a diagonal line

content.detailedDescription: Best friend and i were walking through field at strathacona community centre(pender st east& princess ave)on our way home something made me look up and i saw 4 or 5 green orbs buzzing around each other then going together tight right away i knew they were not man made. then an aquientence of ours came towards us from other entrance on(keefer st east & heatly ave) i will always remember her because sarah devries beccame one of the first 39 missing women from the downtown east side. together the three of us watched these green lights buzz around each other then come together tight about three or for times i am sure we watched these green glowing ufos for approx 25 min then they formed a straight line and started to blink one after anotherfrom left to right.Then all of sudden a thick green laser beam shot out towards the south west from the objects and they were gone. right after that the four spot lights at the p.N.E. turned on and started to shine and rotate to wards the sky.Iwas left exilarated. i would welcome a hypnotist to help me recall exact time and date.               there was another time i saw a slow moving ufo that left a long sparkling trail behind it.Bright sunny day 3pm.  i promise that the above is true!!!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 4or5 green ufos swarmed around each other then came together tight then blinked one after another in straight line left to right.

content.detailedDescription:
On october 17, 2009 around 10:00am in mesa, az, i was busy and diligently doing stuff on my computer --the computer's monitor is situated directly and closely in front of a large window-- when an orange object(s) transiting in the sky away from me heading east caught my attention.  the orange object came from a direction that i normally don't see jets transiting except for one occasion: it was large military jet i think flying at an extremely and ridiculously low altitude.  as i was watching the bright orange, color object through the window, i was thinking that it might be one of those commercial jets which has some orange paint on it as part of its logo.  but the one thing that was odd about it, the orange object's speed was way too slow for it to be a jet.  as i lazily sat there in my chair watching the orange color object, i was beginning to think that it could be just a balloon that i was seeing transiting.  as i slightly squinted my eyes and strained to see it better because of the bright sunlight, it looked like there may be 2 orange color, round objects.  it almost seemed like 1 orange and round object (which was slightly bigger) was rotating upwards somewhat around the smaller orange color and round object.  for about 10 or 15 seconds i was observing these orange color objects when it just disappeared instantly in the sky.  the orange objects didn't just fade away; it just instantly disappeared!  i thought to myself, "now that's strange!"  i then rushed outside onto my patio, and i peered in the general area in the sky intensely to see if this orange object(s) can be seen, or if it would reappear again.  for about a minute or two, i watched the area of the sky where i once saw the object, but i didn't see it again at that moment.  i then walked back inside and sat down in front of my computer, and i gazed out the window again thinking to myself, "what was that?"  it wasn't no more 30 seconds after i sat down that i saw the orange object again in almost the same area of the sky.  it only briefly appeared bright orange, then i saw a flash of brilliant light similar to sunlight being reflected off a mirrored surface, then i saw nothing more in the sky.  i immediately jumped out of my chair; and i grabbed my camera which was nearby, then i quickly hurried outside onto my patio.  all that took less than 5 seconds.  i was determined to get a picture of what ever it was that was flying in the sky.  i looked again with extreme determination in the general area of the sky, but still i didn't see anything including while i was looking through my telescopic lens on the camera.  i watched the sky for about 5 minutes.  then i came back inside into the apartment,  and i watch the sky from the chair with the camera on my lap for about 10 minutes.  but i didn't see anything after that second time. 
  as i recollect, the sky was absolutely clear and brilliantly blue.  no wind was blowing; it was dead calm.  the humidity was very low, and the temperature around mid 80's.  there was no noise of a jet that could be heard, and no contrail was seen anywhere in the sky.  the object was seen at a low altitude that most jet around here fly at.  the object distant was not far away in distant from me: maybe at 4 or 5 football lengths at the most.  if i was to hold something like a pea at arms length away from me, the object size would probably be between either one-quarter or half the size of a pea.
content.summary: Bright orange color object(s) seen transiting slowly; then instantly disappears; then it reappears shortly later; flashes a bright light, then totally disappears.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a law enforcement officer in the yakima valley with four years of full-time experience and six years prior reserve law enforcement experience. i was working the grave yard shift which started at 2200 until 0600 hours late last year in 2008 in approx. november or maybe december. i was on routine patrol that night which was fairly quiet, checking the city cemetery which is west of toppenish, wa. off of elmwood rd. which is off of fort. rd.  the time was approx. 0330 or 0400 hours and i was at the far west end of the cemetery looking into the empty field which is adjacent to the west. beyond the field you can clearly see the house lights through out the county and some of the town lights from white swan, wa. which is approx. 30 miles away at the end of fort. rd.  

the land is mostly flat and runs into the toppenish ridge to the south.  the toppenish ridge starts south of toppenish and reaches passed white swan and almost to mt. adams.  there is a road that goes from white swan to the top of the ridge called signal peak rd. but turns into a yakama indian nation rd. and isn't listed on any map.  at the top of the ridge at end of that yin road, is a guard house with a guard who will not let you through unless you're a yin member.  as far as i know, the guard house closes at night around 2000 hours and the gate into the closed area is locked for the night. i had to explain this for my report to make sense.  

as i drove slowly i could see the twinkling of the house lights in the distance and not paying much attention to anything in particular.  i was about to take a left turn when i noticed what appeared to be old fashioned police or firefighter lights coming from the top of the ridge just south of white swan approx. 30 miles away.  i found this to be strange since most everyone in the valley has either strobe lights or led lights for their emergency vehicles.  the toppenish fd has old rotating lights but it never goes passed the casino on fort rd. 

i watched the lights which were on top of the ridge and i couldn't understand why an emergency vehicle would be on top of the ridge which is rough terrain, dirt, and some trees.  as i looked at the lights, i thought it would be best if i shut my car lights off and shut off my computer screen in my car to get a better look.  when i did, waited a few minutes for my eyes to adjust to the night and when they did, the lights on the ridge looked exactly like emergency lights on a fire truck rotating but from a long distance away.  

i knew at the time, that the only fire call in the lower valley was in grandview for an accident but there wasn't anything going on in the white swan area.  i watched the lights for approx. 10 minutes and they would elevate and descend from the ridge.  as i sat and watched, a second one appeared and now i was seeing two.  the color of the lights were red and white and looked exactly like the lights on a fire truck.  the lights were bright and were clearly visible to me while i sat in my car.  

i exited my patrol car and i stood in the dark and watched these two pair of lights move up and down and side ways which appeared to be doing some sort of pattern.  as i stood there, i figured i would notify my dispatcher and ask her if she knew of any calls on the ridge.  i got back into my car and got on my computer and i send her an instant message telling her i was seeing some strange lights on the ridge and asked her if she knew of any emergency calls in that area.  the dispatcher stated she didn't know and would inquire.  she later told me the only call the fd was handling was an accident as i stated above.  

i then im'd another officer on duty who is a ten year veteran law enforcement officer and told him what i was seeing and asked him to come to the cemetery.  when he arrived, we both watched the lights on the ridge for approx. 10 when a third set of lights appeared.  we both stood in the dark and watched these lights for approx. another 10 or 15 minutes.  we could not figure out who or what they were and we just stood there and watched.  they would appear and disappear over the ridge and would some times hover over each other.  some times two sets would go off and one would stay and the one would go off and the other two re-appear.  it was an incredible display which went on for a while. at one point, i tried to record them with my in car video called coban but the lights were too far away and coban could not get a clear enough picture. 

when our shift ended, the day shift officer was briefed on what we saw and of course he made fun of us and laughed.  but he later told me he went out to the cemetery and saw the same thing we did on the ridge.  he told us they were probably fire trucks doing some sort of exercise on the ridge and i responded by asking him " when was the last time you heard of volunteer firefighters doing exercises on the top of a ridge with rough terrain and no roads?" he didn't respond and told me he didn't know what they were.  

a few months later around june of this year, i was here at home surfing the internet and decided to look up town marshal history for the yakima valley.  to my amazement, i ran across a web site that read, "toppenish ridge lights"  i read through the investigation which was very detailed and had some photographs taken at the time of the incident.  i was even more shocked to learn that the lights were seen in 1972 and describes exactly how we saw it that night.  

this concludes my report and i have nothing further to add, nor do i have anything to gain or lose by typing this.  what i saw and what my fellow officers saw is still a mystery to us and i want answers to the puzzle. i think mufon should look into the matter and conduct interviews of the people who live in the white swan area along signal peak rd. and fort rd. 

below is the link that will take you to the web site i found.
http://www.Sacred-texts.Com/ufo/yak2.Htm 

this statement was typed to the best of knowledge and truthfully.  i have worked in law enforcement and nuclear security for the past ten years and i believe i am a very credible witness to what i saw.  i have taken five polygraph tests and passed them all throughout my career to include four psychological exams.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Toppenish ridge lights

content.detailedDescription: We were outside of our house in madbury nh(we live in the country) on october 19 2009.Starting at 11:00 pm and we went inside at 11:45 pm.It is 35 degrees outside.We noticed 3 bright white lights with flashing red light on bottem center and yellow,green and blue flashing lights on the sides. we used banoculers and the objects seemed to be spinning but stayed in one place. we really could not make out the shape because they  were spinning that it was hard to make out.With the naked eye they looked star like but a little bigger and very bright. we tried to take pictures but could not zoom in enough.We thought maybe the 1st one we saw was a plane,do to the red light flashing but when we noticed it was not moving and there was more then one color of light flashing we were not sure what it was..When we then noticed the other two near the first one...We were very curious..We could also hear a loud hum noise..Like you were standing next to a transformer(no transformers near us)(which led us to google and then to this site mufon.Com)we watched for about 45 minutes until they just vanished into thin air. we will keep an eye out the next few nights and will report if we see this again..
content.summary: 3 bright lights with flashing colors

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Hi, ive never done this and not sure your the people but at about 8:30pm california time. i was walking home when i seen 5-7red lights in a semi circle fly over me it remained a semi circle with dim white/grey area in the middle threw the cloud cover.Each object having only 1 red light flashing not in unison heading in a southern direction from hanford, california. i thought at 1rst maybe it was from the local naval air base but why so many lights and no sound? and this isnt the 1st time ive seen things over my home.
content.summary: 5-7red non unison no sound(semi circle/full oval shape).

content.detailedDescription:
while my wife was driving to store 5601 amarillo blvd west i ( passenger) noticed a very bright star to the west at the intersection of avondale and west 9th. when we got to store i pointed it out to my wife. 

the next night we are at 2530 s georgia we came out of the store it was 7:20 pm and the car is parked to the south and in the sw sky is the bright star again. we get out the field glasses to get a better look. the man in the truck next to ask what we are looking at. he sees it also and then a few other people notice it in the parking lot too. 
 what we see is a blue white diamond shape object very bright. in the field glasses it appears to have 4 bright spots going across a line that would be 1/4 down from the top. my wife looks with the field glasses and sees the red sphere dropping from the white line heading to the bottom or point of the object. other noticed the red sphere as it existed the object and drifted down out of the object. then the white object changed it shape to an inverted tear drop and then both red and white objects faded away. time was about 7:30. the object was still all during our viewing of it.Are feelings in awe of what we had seen. as so were others in the parking lot.
content.summary: Bright blue white diamond shape that dropped red sphere

content.detailedDescription:
At about 2020, my husband and i were driving south on 2461, and at approximately 30-50 yards south of the intersecting lights on 570 and 2461, my husband saw a white light that contained some orange color to it, appear and then disappear.  it was low to the ground, around maybe 1-2 miles up.  it was difficult to determine the distance it was from us.  it did not move, only appeared bright and then disapeared.  he did not know what the object was, he only knew it was like a star, but much brighter.  he asked me if i saw the bright light, and i told him i did not.  i asked him if it was a reflection or an airplane, and he said no.  after it disappeared, we both continued to look for it, but it did not reappear at that time.  i did eventually see an airplane's lights at a much farther and higher distance and mentioned this to him, and we decided it could have been a plane.   

we arrived home and unloaded shopping bags from our vehicle.  i got some books from inside the house and left again.  i drove up my driveway, turned to the southwest and the light appeared very brightly, only once, and again disappeared.  to me, this light was a light orange color.  it did not appear white to me.  i called my husband, who had stayed behind at our home, on my cell phone and told him i saw his light.  i continued driving to the lamancha entrance and stopped, looking in the same direction the orange light had been.  at this time, i do not recall if i saw it again or not and my husband does not recall if i mentioned seeing it a second time.

i turned right on 570 heading northeast, followed a curve to the east, southeast, to cross the dam.  at this time, my husband was still on the phone with me and he went outside to look more.  as we were talking, 3 orange lights appeared in the east-southeast direction and were lined up horizontally.  they remained on for 1-2 seconds and disappeared.  we both saw this at the same time.  this was closer to just before 2100, approximately 2050-2055.  after we saw this, i became very excited, but sort of nervous because i did not know what this was.  my husband just told me to deliver the books and get back home.  as i drove to deliver the books, we remained on the phone together talking because i was nervous driving alone, and we saw airplane lights that seemed to be watching the area where these lights were.  when i got to my destination, i watched momentarily and noticed fast-moving airplane lights and another airplane or helicopter below the 2 fast-moving ones.  all of them appeared to be circling the area where the lights had been.
content.summary: White, orange lights seen near lake leon, eastland county, texas; singularly and then 3 in row, horizontally.

content.detailedDescription:
October 1, 2009, 9:28 pm cdt
in amarillo texas, latitude 35 n, longitude 102 w, elevation 3300
moon nearly full at azimuth 129, altitude 34.

i spotted a very bright, star-like object completely out of place in the constellation cassiopeia (azimuth 30, altitude 34, magnitude -3).  i was surprised and perplexed.  without thinking, i immediately checked my bearings by glancing some 90 degrees to the southeast to confirm that the moon and jupiter were where i expected them to be.  as i looked back to the object i thought that it must be the international space station, but quickly decided that it was not because it was completely stationary.   there was no flickering or pulsating, but it soon became evident that the object was gradually getting smaller and dimmer.  in less than a minute it faded completely away and did not reappear.

apparently a geostationary (geosynchronous) satellite flash?  i couldnft find much on the web about it and so assume that itfs a fairly rare occurrence.

more at http://www.Unusualsightings.Com/
content.summary: Larger and brighter than jupiter, stationary,  gradually getting dimmer, faded completely away in 60 sec.

content.detailedDescription: We were at us-23 drive-in movies on fenton rd between hill and maple roads waiting for the show to begin. when i noticed a fireball looking object coming from the east and positioned north of the theater. a few seconds later two more fireball looking objects positioned themselves under the first one to form a triangular formation. they were moving at a very slow rate of speed and consistently remained the same amount of distance from one another.  there were no blinking lights on the objects. there were an orangish bright color like the sun. i couldn't believe it, i tried to photograph it with my cell phone but it wouldn't show up. i could only view blackness in my phone. i kept following the path of the objects until they disappeared from view into the clouds. approximately 10 minutes later and after the movie had started a fourth object with the exact same appearance came from the same direction and headed in the same direction as the other three. it was moving at a higher rate of speed and i followed it too until it dissappeared into the clouds.
content.summary: There were three of them in a triangular formation moving at a slow speed, followed by a fourth one about 10 minutes later.

content.detailedDescription: I was conducting zone inspections of our base. i glanced up and noticed two amber orbs traveling ese around 300 to 400 mph. they did not have any anti collision lights. they seemed to dim and brighten erraticlly but slow. they were about a thousand ft. apart one behind the other moving in a straight line. after about 30 seconds they simultaneously dimmed out completely. there was no faint outline once they were lights out. they never reappeared. my first thought was that they were military aircraft until they shut off there lights. military aircraft only do that in a theater of war not in heavily congested airspace over u.S. soil like philadelphia and it's suburbs. aside from the heavy air traffic the skies were completely clear, no clouds and you could see every star in the sky. i've spent the last 14 years in the navy with the first 10 in aviation as an aviation structural machanic working on f-14 tomcats a/b/d, mh-53 sea dragons, ch-46 sea nights and mh-60s nighthawks. the last 4 as a military police officer. i know aircraft! they were not civilian or military. they were either topsecret a/c or offworld.
content.summary: Two amber orbs traveling east south east over nas jrb willow grove.

content.detailedDescription: Began seeing sphere objects around the end of july was sitting on my deck with my girlfriend and it was a nice evening and very clear starlit sky when i noticed an object moving from the south to north direction i have a very good view from my deck so i had my binoculars with me.The object was orange in color but seemed lit from inside by what iooked almost like an led type of light.I knew it was not an airplane,no flashing marker lights,and made no noise that i could hear.I knew for sure when the object stopped,disappeared,reappeared and continued on a northbound course.About 15 min later i saw another moving from the west this one was greenish,same size and moving about the same speed.It was hard to judge altitude but it looked to be about the same as the jets i see flying over im guessing between 10 20 thousand maybe.I seen maybe 15 of these objects between late july and sept.I actualy seen two that looked like they were racing each other.By the way my girlfriend also witnessed several of these.The speed of these seem to be alittle faster than the airliners i see what do they cruise at? maybe four or five hundred mph?.I noticed one in my telescope looking at jupiter about a month ago,it was way out there because i couldnt find it in my binocs.Just wondering if anybody knows what or if they have seen these.One more thing,there is an episode on paranormal state where they investagated lights in washington state.What they were looking at is very simular to what i was seeing here.
content.summary: Seen sphere objects
